column1: The standard-issue border patrol weapon is the P-29 stun baton. It carries a 4000 watt charge and is your best option for enforcin' border patrol law.
The baton is non-lethal, but powerful e-
There's too many of 'em! We're gonna need backup!
Hey! Hey wait a minute!  It's a Mexican!  I think he wants to come back in!
This is Marcus with INsecurity. Is everything all right?
All right, could I just get your password please?
Oh oh I get it. That's pretty funny.
